plot: In 1815, Michael Martin, member of an Irish revolutionary society, turns highwayman to support it, and is forced to flee into outlawry. In Dublin, he meets famous rebel &"Captain Thunderbolt&" and becomes his second-in-command, &"Lightfoot.&" 'Tis a perilous life, with captures, turncoats, rescues, and romance.   Written by  Rod Crawford
title: Orgullo de raza
